channel.title: Request for a very simple script
channel.description: Can someone please create a script in which is clicks on a certain color on the screen once until it dissapears? something like hit the gopher only clicking on it once and click again when it appears again. Thx.

item.title: Request for a very simple script
item.dc:creator: @xxhellfirexx xxhellfirexx
item.description:
@xxhellfirexx wrote:

Something seems to be very odd about this script…although I added a wait time of 50 after every shot it still keeps shooting at the same one at the speed of 1 millisecond…does anyone know how to fix this?

item.title: Request for a very simple script
item.dc:creator: @phonnygoblin phonnygoblin
item.description:
@phonnygoblin wrote:

[scar]
//made this w/o scar double check\
program Phonnygoblinsscript;
var x,y:integer;
const color = 10944908;
procedure phonnygoblin;
begin
if(findcolorspiral(x,y,color,3,3,1200,800))then
wait(1000);
movemousesmooth(x,y);
wait(1000);
clickmouse(x,y,true);
writeln(‘GO KANE!!!’);
end;
begin
repeat
phonnygoblin;
until(false);
end.
[/scar]

Read full topic
